site_name: SeaQuest Interactive Aquarium Fort Worth LLC

citations.narrative:
***Throughout the facility, there were three enclosures that contained a Patagonian Cavy, a Tammar Wallaby and three
Silkie Chickens. The animals in these enclosures were in constant view of the public as their housing did not contain a
place, house, hiding area or a way for these animals to not, at all times while on exhibit, be in public view.
Animals within constant view of the public increase the risk of stress and abnormal behavior. The licensee must ensure
that animals are exhibited only for periods of time and under conditions consistent with their good health and well-being.
This was corrected during the inspection and must remain corrected from June 14, 2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.131(d)(1) 
   
Handling of animals. 
***Throughout the facility, there were three enclosures that contained a Patagonian Cavy, a Tammar Wallaby and three 
Silkie Chickens. The animals in these enclosures were in constant view of the public as their housing did not contain a 
place, house, hiding area or a way for these animals to not, at all times while on exhibit, be in public view. 
Animals within constant view of the public increase the risk of stress and abnormal behavior. The licensee must ensure 
that animals are exhibited only for periods of time and under conditions consistent with their good health and well-being. 
This was corrected during the inspection and must remain corrected from June 14, 2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
